timeline.message: Make symmetric encryption as the default encryption mechanism forinternal data

timeline.bodyText: why we need to add a unicode here
timeline.author: malithie

replies.bodyText:
In toml keys are seperated by full stop (.)
Since org.wso2.CipherTransformation is one key, we need to define it as one key. We can use "system.parameter.'org.wso2.CipherTransformation'" or "system.parameter.\u0027org.wso2.CipherTransformation\u0027" . Since we have used unicode based one in other places [1], used the same.
[1]https://github.com/wso2/carbon-kernel/blob/e510cc9334f516d02b27aef3ddb670bf13ba45e9/distribution/kernel/carbon-home/repository/resources/conf/default.json#L174
